long_description: From marathon training to long trail runs, the Amphipod RunLite AirStretch 2+ hydration belt comfortably transports fluid and basic essentials with a hip-gripping, jostle-free design. AirStretch belt comes with two 10.5 fl. oz. flasks; 43mm wide mouths make flasks easy to fill and clean. Flasks snap into belt and release with a simple, single-handed squeeze, providing effortless access to your fluids. Pouch features external gel slots for up to four gels and internal divided see-through pocket for cards, key, cash and other small items. Pouch expands to hold sunglasses, keys, cards/ID and other essentials. The Amphipod RunLite AirStretch 2+ hydration belt features polyethylene flasks that are 100% BPA free. Size 2 (Medium) fits waists 30 - 35 in.; size 3 (Large) fits waists 35 - 42 in.
